SEARCH
Module iu.util.type.base
Package edu.iu.type.base

Class ModularClassLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
edu.iu.type.base.ModularClassLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class ModularClassLoader extends ClassLoader implements AutoCloseable
Closeable ClassLoader implementation that manages an application-defined ModuleLayer.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModularClassLoader

      public ModularClassLoader(boolean web, Iterable<Path> path, ModuleLayer parentLayer, ClassLoader parent, Consumer<ModuleLayer.Controller> controllerCallback) throws IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      web - true for web classloading semantics; false for normal parent delegation semantics
      path - class/module path
      parentLayer - parent module layer
      parent - parent class loader
      controllerCallback - receives a reference to the ModuleLayer.Controller for the module layer created in conjunction with this loader. API Note from ModuleLayer.Controller: Care should be taken with Controller objects, they should never be shared with untrusted code.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs reading a class path entry

    • ModularClassLoader

      public ModularClassLoader(boolean web, Iterable<Path> classpath, Iterable<Path> modulepath, ModuleLayer parentLayer, ClassLoader parent, Consumer<ModuleLayer.Controller> controllerCallback) throws IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      web - true for web classloading semantics; false for normal parent delegation semantics
      classpath - class path
      modulepath - module path
      parentLayer - parent module layer
      parent - parent class loader
      controllerCallback - receives a reference to the ModuleLayer.Controller for the module layer created in conjunction with this loader. API Note from ModuleLayer.Controller: Care should be taken with Controller objects, they should never be shared with untrusted code.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs reading a class path entry

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static final ModularClassLoader of(ClassLoader parent, ModuleLayer parentLayer, Supplier<Iterable<Path>> modulePath, Consumer<ModuleLayer.Controller> controllerCallback)
      Creates a modular class loader from raw input.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent ClassLoader
      parentLayer - parent ModuleLayer
      modulePath - supplies module path entries on demand within a TemporaryFile.init(UnsafeRunnable) context.
      controllerCallback - receives a ModuleLayer.Controller handle that should be used and discarded by the application before any classes are loaded
      Returns:
      ModularClassLoader

    • getModuleLayer

      public ModuleLayer getModuleLayer()
      Gets the module layer associated with this class loader.
      Returns:
      ModuleLayer

    • findResource

      void findResource(String name, BiPredicate<ModuleReference,URL> resourcePredicate)
      Finds module and resource URL for resources available from this class loader.
      Parameters:
      name - resource name
      resourcePredicate - receives a reference to the module and resource URL for each instance of the resource found; returns true to terminate the loop after inspecting the reference, false to keep searching

    • isOpen

      boolean isOpen(Module module, String name)
      Helper fragment for findResource(String) and findResources(String).
      Parameters:
      module - module that contains the resource
      name - resource name
      Returns:
      true if the resource is either not encapsulated or is in a package that is unconditionally open
      See Also:
      • findResource(String)
      • findResources(String)
      • Module.getResourceAsStream(String)
